response.original_title: The Woodsmaster Volume 06 Primitive Weapons Technology
response.overview: Learn about the Viet Cong cross bow a simple and elegant solution to getting game and defending yourself. Learn how to "tiller" a functional bow and make arrows. See how to make and use an atlatl. Learn the skills and techniques of the sling, the throwing stick and a bunch more! Learn some basic hide tanning techniques and more information on the Lithic artsâ€¦ Pressure flaking.
